Welcome to Rock-paper-scissors!
Please enter your move (0 - rock, 1 - paper, 2 - scissors) and a random number
Your move is rock, computer's move is paper. You lose!
Your move is rock, computer's move is rock. Draw!
Your move is rock, computer's move is scissors. You win!
Your move is paper, computer's move is scissors. You lose!
Your move is paper, computer's move is rock. You win!
Your move is paper, computer's move is paper. Draw!
Your move is scissors, computer's move is paper. You win!
Your move is scissors, computer's move is rock. You lose!
Your move is scissors, computer's move is scissors. Draw!
invalid move
Bye
